message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.DS

This paper proposes a novel off-chain system to improve the scalability of decentralized ledgers through the use of payment channels. It specifically focuses on the routing of payments through multiple channels and proposes the use of a channel hub to shorten the routing path. The paper also presents a new protocol named Boros to perform secure off-chain cross-channel transfers through the channel hub. Given the focus on security and network protocols, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Other likely sub-categories include cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
